item.description:
The Federation has sent out its robot army to destroy the planet. It is up to the Battle Troopers to stop the droids in their tracks. A mighty battle awaits for both sides. The Federation has waves after waves of droids to throw on the battlefield, but the Battle Troopers are battle hardened with experience on their side. This is but the beginning of the war. The outcome of this NERF Buddy Night will affect the flow of battle for the next event. Gear up your NERF blaster and darts for an epic two hour battle event for ages 6 and up!

Call us at 781-270-4800 to pre-register; $15/member, $20/nonmember. Blaster lease available.
item.name: Buddy Night with NERF: Robo Rampage
